meta.title: IT and Tea - Leading AI Solutions for Business Innovation
meta.description: IT and Tea is a cutting-edge AI company delivering innovative solutions to drive business growth and transformation. Our expertise spans artificial intelligence, data analysis, and automation, helping businesses thrive in the digital era. Explore how our AI-powered products and services can empower your future.

tts.cardTitle: Welcome to IT and Tea's Advanced TTS Solution
tts.textareaValue: Welcome to IT and Tea's TTS platform! Experiment with different text inputs to hear how they affect the synthesized speech.

hero.title: Welcome to IT&TEA
hero.description: IT&TEA provides advanced software and AI solutions

calloutAI.title: IT&TEA: Your AI Solution Architects
calloutAI.description: We build and apply cutting-edge AI models, such as Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision, to craft powerful solutions that drive your business value.

HomePage.speech: Hello, welcome to IT and tea

slider.northPathSubtitle: Guide for Chinese Immigrants to Canada
slider.northPathDescription: North Path is designed for Chinese immigrants, offering comprehensive information on immigration, studying abroad, and living in Canada.
slider.kairosSubtitle: Stock Prediction System Using LSTM & Transformer
slider.kairosDescription: Kairos utilizes advanced machine learning models, including LSTM and Transformer, to analyze stock market trends and provide accurate predictions for better decision-making.

about.aboutDescription: IT and Tea specializes in providing advanced AI solutions to help businesses achieve intelligent transformation and innovation.
about.storyDescription: Founded by a passionate fullstack developer, IT and Tea aims to drive the growth of businesses in the era of AI through technological innovation, building a more promising future together.
about.missionDescription: IT and Tea is dedicated to delivering intelligent and innovative AI solutions that empower businesses to gain a competitive edge in an ever-evolving market.
about.yuanBio: He is an experienced fullstack software engineer with 10 years of industry experience and a passion for technology. Proficient in modern tech stacks like Next.js and TypeScript, he has led the development of most of this site's features. He believes in the power of technology to improve people's lives and is dedicated to using his skills and experience to create a convenient, efficient, and reliable online platform for users.
